com.bouyguesenergiesservices.opcuafctaddon.gateway.service

Interface GetOPCService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GetOPCServiceImpl

    public interface GetOPCService
    Interface to Manage All OPC functions expose through the GAN Methods in this interface can be called by Gateway opcService.getService...() Created by regis on 18/10/2016.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceReadValues

        java.util.List<com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.model.values.QualifiedValue> getServiceReadValues(java.lang.String opcServer,
                                                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath)
        Equivalent to the system.opc.readValue in the GAN.
        Parameters:
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        Returns:
        QualifiedValue[] A sequence of objects, one for each address specified, in order. Each object will contains the value, quality, and timestamp returned from the OPC server for the corresponding address.

      • getServiceIsSubscribe

        boolean getServiceIsSubscribe(java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Check if the specify Subscription Name is currently exist in the GAN.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
        boolean True, if the subscription is currently declare and managed else False.

      • getServiceSubscribe

        java.lang.String getServiceSubscribe(java.lang.String opcServer,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath,
                                     int rate)
        Declare an OPC Subscription (through the GAN) with lstItemPath (only integer type). Call cyclically the readSubscribeValues to refresh all values.
        Parameters:
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        rate - Frequency of the subscription
        Returns:
        String UID of the subscription declare

      • getServiceReadSubscribeValues

        java.util.List<com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.model.values.QualifiedValue> getServiceReadSubscribeValues(java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Get all last OPC values states of lstItemPath subscribe before subscriptionName in the GAN. If there is no change until the previous calling, None is return. If a subscription isn't read with "readSubscribeValues" function 30 seconds later, it is automatically unsubscribe (Timeout).
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
        QualifiedValue[] A sequence of ALL objects (even unchanged object), one for each address specified, in order. Each object will contains the value, quality, and timestamp returned from the OPC server for the corresponding address.

      • getServiceUnsubscribe

        boolean getServiceUnsubscribe(java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Unsubscribe a Subscription on the GAN.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
        boolean True, if subscription exist and unsubscribe else False

      • getServiceUnsubscribeAll

        void getServiceUnsubscribeAll()
        Unsubscribe ALL Item subscribe before in the GAN.
